show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 09 Sallie Calhoun, do and don'ts from the most experienced regen ag investor
subtitle: 09 Sallie Calhoun, do and don'ts from the most experienced regen ag investor
summary:
Lessons from 15years of impact investing in food and agriculture. Sallie and her team are working on a platform #NoRegrets Initiative to educate investors and funders about the latest science on Soil Health and consider Soil Health with every investment and grant they make.

This time I had a conversation with Sallie Calhoun, impact investor in regenerative agriculture for over 15 years!
